channel.title: Run.bat gives weird error
channel.description:
heres the error i get.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
anybody know why? im using a blank delta 317 source base, this has happened while trying other bases too, infact, all but 2 did this.

item.title: Run.bat gives weird error
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

Make Sure your runbat if with all the other files, Try searching for another mainbat, because when people release server they sometimes copy one to the first folder and it dosent always work.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat gives weird error
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Ehh no Fails, thats for the “System cannot find the path specified”

Its the last part of your run.bat code that is causing that error
basically it means it cannot find the ‘main’ executable class (usually named main.java (wonder why ) or Server.java)

com.rs2hd.Main

^ Looks similar to that meaning

In package com -> rs2hd -> Class (Main)

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat gives weird error
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

I’ve Gotten This Error Alot, Try Right clicking on your run And Click Edit. Do U See A number like…
1.6.0_22 If So Change that to your version of java then retry tell me if u have any problems… If U need more help comment again.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat gives weird error
item.dc:creator: @rigorous rigorous
item.description:
@rigorous wrote:

heres the error i get.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

anybody know why? im using a blank delta 317 source base, this has happened while trying other bases too, infact, all but 2 did this.

Read full topic
